ocean.question: I'm big and blue and full of water. Boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 Fish live in me.
🚢 I cover most of the Earth.
🏖️ You might build a sandcastle next to me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. I might hide inside my shell when scared. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am a type of mollusk.
🥬 I eat plants at the bottom of the ocean.
🏠 My home is on my back.

ocean.question: I'm a colorful fish that can repeat what you say, sort of. What am I?

hints.text: 🦜 I share a name with a tropical bird.
🌈 I have many different colors on my scales.
🐟 I like to eat algae.

ocean.question: I'm a giant of the sea, known for singing songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I'm a mammal, not a fish.
🌬️ I breathe air through a blowhole.
🎶 I communicate using complex sounds.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can change color. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I use suction cups to grab things.
🎨 I can blend in with my surroundings.
🧠 I am very intelligent.

ocean.question: I'm a very small, bright creature that drifts in the ocean. Many animals eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I'm like the grass of the sea.
🔬 You'd need a microscope to see me individually.
🍣 Many larger animals depend on me for food.

ocean.question: I'm a place underwater built by tiny animals. I'm colorful and full of life. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am made of skeletons of small animals.
🐠 Many fish and creatures live near me.
☀️ I am usually found in warm, sunny waters.

ocean.question: I'm a powerful force that moves water around the Earth. I affect the weather. What am I?

hints.text: 🔄 I am caused by wind, temperature, and salt.
🌡️ Warm ones can make places warmer.
🌊 I can be like a river flowing within the ocean.

ocean.question: I am the deepest part of the ocean. It is very dark and cold down here. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 Sunlight doesn't reach me.
🏔️ I am deeper than Mount Everest is tall.
🔦 Special creatures live here that make their own light.

ocean.question: I'm a long chain of underwater mountains. Sometimes I get so tall I pop out of the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌋 I am formed by volcanic activity under the sea.
🏝️ The Hawaiian Islands are part of me.
🌍 I can mark the boundaries between tectonic plates.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm white and fluffy. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm cold!
☃️ You can build with me.
🏔️ I cover mountains in winter.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow, and I shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I give you warmth.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
🌻 Plants need me to grow.

weather.question: I come after a storm, and I have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I'm shaped like an arc.
🌧️ You often see me after rain.
🧪 My colors are created by light and water.

weather.question: I move the leaves and make kites fly. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I can be gentle or strong.
🍃 You can't see me.
⛵ I help boats move on the water.

weather.question: I am white and float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like fluffy animals.
🌧️ I can turn dark and stormy.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.

weather.question: I am water falling from the sky. You need an umbrella when I come. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ I make puddles.
🌱 Plants need me to grow.
💧 I'm part of the water cycle.

weather.question: I am a storm with a spinning center and very strong winds. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I form over warm ocean water.
🏠 People prepare for me by boarding up windows.
🌊 I can cause flooding.

weather.question: I am a sudden, heavy fall of ice. I can damage cars and plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I'm frozen rain.
⛈️ I often come with thunderstorms.
⚾ I can be small or large like a baseball.

weather.question: I am a long period with very little or no rain. The ground becomes very dry. What am I?

hints.text: 🏜️ I can cause plants to die.
🔥 I increase the risk of wildfires.
💧 People might have to conserve water during me.

weather.question: I am a violently rotating column of air that extends from a thunderstorm to the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I look like a funnel.
💨 I am very destructive.
🐄 People take shelter underground during me.
